Use this data source to get information about a Workspaces Bundle.

#### Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = aws.workspaces.getBundle({
    bundleId: "wsb-b0s22j3d7",
});
```
